TextView.android:text: Obtained the PhD. in Mathematics Science by the Complutense University of Madrid in 1993. From 1985, she belongs to the Applied Mathematics Department in Polytechnical University of Madrid. Her research lines covers topics related to signal procesing, cryptography and biometrics. At present, she is a Professor in previous mention deparment where she lectures different subjects related to Mathematic and Numeric Analysis, together with subjects covering topics in Wavelets and Biometric Systems in PhD. courses.
